title: TVS Motor Co June sales climb 3 pc at 3.16 lakh units
description: TVS Motor Company reported a 3% growth in total sales in June 2023 compared to the same month last year. Total two-wheeler sales increased by 4%, with domestic two-wheeler sales growing by 22%. Motorcycle sales rose by 2%, while scooter sales increased by 11%. The company mentioned that the first two weeks of June saw a decline in electric vehicle sales due to a readjustment in prices but remains confident in the coming months.
